scripts.dev: concurrently -n shared,server,client -c yellow,blue,green "npm run dev -w shared" "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.dev:kill: lsof -ti :8080 | xargs -r kill -9; lsof -ti :5173 | xargs -r kill -9; pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
